mapper.select: select version from feedback where file_name = #{fileName} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into feedback (serial_num, time, qa_type, source, institution_type, province, city, district, content_type, content, contact, version, status, file_name) values (#{serialNum}, #{time}, #{qaType}, #{source}, #{institutionType}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{contentType}, #{content}, #{contact}, #{version}, #{status}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: update feedback set distributed = 1, distribute_time = NOW(), status = "已分发" where distributed = 0 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(update_time) >= ${timeInterval}
update feedback set distributed = 1, distribute_time = NOW(), status = "已分发" where distributed = 0
update feedback set distributed = 1, distribute_time = NOW(), status = "已分发" where distributed = 0 and id = #{feedbackId}
